title: Why You Ackin’ So Cray-Cray?
description: Sassica will tell you exactly what she thinks and it’s almost always, “Why you ackin’ so cray-cray?”
quote: Aw, girl… girl, you know what I’m ‘bout to say.
altHero: Sassica sits with a teenage guest, the crowd cheers
alt1: Sassica being sassy with her teen guest
alt2: Sassica being sassy with a guest in a wedding dress eating a whole turkey
alt3: Sassica being sassy with a woman carving “Love me” into a tree trunk with a chainsaw
alt4: Sassica being sassy with an older woman with five cats dressed in human clothes
